T17matpra_u:1: sarvadā sarvathā sarve yasya doṣā na santi ha /
T17matpra_u:3: tam eva śaraṇaṃ gantuṃ taṃ stotuṃ tam upāsitum /
T17matpra_u:4: tasyaiva śāsane sthātuṃ nyāyyaṃ yady asti cetanā // 2
T17matpra_u:5: savāsanāś ca te doṣā na santy ekasya tāyinaḥ /
T17matpra_u:6: sarve sarvavidaḥ santi guṇās te cānapāyinaḥ // 3
T17matpra_u:8: saha dharmeṇa labhate kaś cid bhagavato 'ntaram // 4
T17matpra_u:16: yasya saṃkhyāprabhāvābhyāṃ na guṇeṣv asti niścayaḥ // 8
T17matpra_u:17: iyanta iti nāsty anta īdṛśā iti kā kathā /
T17matpra_u:18: puṇyā ity eva tu guṇān prati te mukharā vayam // 9
T17matpra_u:20: svayam abhyupapannaṃ te nirākrandam idaṃ jagat // 10
T17matpra_u:23: svamāṃsāny api dattāni vastuṣv anyeṣu kā kathā /
T17matpra_u:24: prāṇair api tvayā sādho mānitaḥ praṇayī janaḥ // 12
T17matpra_u:25: svaiḥ śarīraiḥ śarīrāṇi prāṇaiḥ prāṇāḥ śarīriṇām /
T17matpra_u:33: parārthe tyajataḥ prāṇān yā prītir abhavat tava /
T17matpra_u:34: na sā naṣṭopalabdheṣu prāṇeṣu prāṇināṃ bhavet // 17
T17matpra_u:36: vadhakeṣv api sattveṣv kāruṇyam abhavat prabho // 18
T17matpra_u:38: tvam eva vīra sārajño dūre tasyetaro janaḥ // 19
T17matpra_u:39: nākṛtvā duṣkaraṃ karma durlabham labhyate padam /
T17matpra_u:41: viśeṣotkarṣaniyamo na kadā cid abhūt tava /
T17matpra_u:45: tvādṛśān pīḍayaty eva nānugṛhṇāti tat sukham /
T17matpra_u:46: praṇītam api sadvṛtta yad asādhāraṇaṃ paraiḥ // 23
T17matpra_u:47: vimiśrāt sāram ādattaṃ sarvaṃ pītam akalmaṣam /
T17matpra_u:48: tvayā sūktaṃ duruktaṃ tu viṣavat parivarjitam // 24
T17matpra_u:51: iti tribhir asaṃkhyeyair evam udyacchatā tvayā /
T17matpra_u:54: agatvā sadṛśaiḥ spardhāṃ tvaṃ loke śreṣṭhatāṃ gataḥ // 27
T17matpra_u:55: hetuṣv abhiniveśo 'bhūd guṇānāṃ na phaleṣu te /
T17matpra_u:56: tena samyakpratipadā tvayi niṣṭhāṃ guṇā gatāḥ // 28
T17matpra_u:57: tathātmā pracayaṃ nītas tvayā sucaritair yathā /
T17matpra_u:60: guṇās tena sunītena parāṃ siddhiṃ tvam adhyagāḥ // 30
T17matpra_u:63: tathā saṃbhṛtya saṃbhṛtya tvayātmany āhitā guṇāḥ /
T17matpra_u:64: pratirūpakam apy eṣāṃ yathā nānyatra dṛśyate // 32
T17matpra_u:68: anuttarāṇāṃ kā tarhi guṇānām upamāstu te // 34
T17matpra_u:74: na ravir viṣaye bhūmiṃ khādyotīm api vindati // 37
T17matpra_u:77: anena sarvaṃ vyākhyātaṃ yat kiṃ cit sādhu laukikam /
T17matpra_u:79: yasyaiva dharmaratnasya prāptyā prāptas tvam agratām /
T17matpra_u:80: tenaiva kevalaṃ sādho sāmyaṃ te tasya ca tvayā // 40
T17matpra_u:83: pratanv iva hi paśyāmi dharmatām anucintayan /
T17matpra_u:84: sarvaṃ cāvarjitaṃ māravijayaṃ prati te jagat // 42
T17matpra_u:88: tasyām eva kṛtaṃ rātrau tad eva paramādbhutam // 44
T17matpra_u:90: vīra vismayam āgacchet sa tīrthyavijaye tava // 45
T17matpra_u:92: mūḍho vigatamohena tribhir nityaṃ jitās trayaḥ // 46
T17matpra_u:94: anurodhavirodhau ca na staḥ sadasatos tava // 47
T17matpra_u:96: yasya te cetaso 'nyatvaṃ tasya te kā stutir bhavet // 48
T17matpra_u:97: guṇeṣv api na saṅgo 'bhūt tṛṣṇā na guṇavatsv api /
T17matpra_u:100: mano nityaprasannaṃ te pratyakṣam iva dṛśyate // 50
T17matpra_u:103: upaśāntaṃ ca kāntaṃ ca dīptam apratighāti ca /
T17matpra_u:104: nibhṛtaṃ corjitaṃ cedaṃ rūpaṃ kam iva nākṣipet // 52
T17matpra_u:105: yenāpi śataśo dṛṣṭaṃ yo 'pi tatpūrvam īkṣate /
T17matpra_u:106: rūpaṃ prīṇāti te cakṣuḥ samaṃ tad ubhayor api // 53
T17matpra_u:107: asecanakabhāvād dhi saumyabhāvāc ca te vapuḥ /
T17matpra_u:108: darśane darśane prītiṃ vidadhāti navāṃ navām // 54
T17matpra_u:111: kvānyatra suniviṣṭāḥ syur ime tāthāgatā guṇāḥ /
T17matpra_u:113: dhanyam asmīti te rūpaṃ vadatīvāśritān guṇān /
T17matpra_u:114: sunikṣiptā vayam iti pratyāhur iva tad guṇāḥ // 57
T17matpra_u:115: sarvam evāviśeṣeṇa kleśair baddham idaṃ jagat /
T17matpra_u:117: kaṃ nu prathamato vande tvāṃ mahākaruṇām uta /
T17matpra_u:118: yayaivam api doṣajñas tvaṃ saṃsāre dhṛtaś ciram // 59
T17matpra_u:120: kālā labdhaprasarayā tat te karuṇayā kṛtam // 60
T17matpra_u:121: śāntād araṇyād grāmāntaṃ tvaṃ hi nāga iva hradāt /
T17matpra_u:125: ṛddhir yā siṃhanādā ye svaguṇodbhāvanāś ca yāḥ /
T17matpra_u:129: tathā hi kṛtvā śatadhā dhīrā balim iva kva cit /
T17matpra_u:132: tathā hi bādhamānāpi tvāṃ satī nāparādhyate // 66
T17matpra_u:135: kasya na syād upaśrutya vākyāny evaṃvidhāni te /
T17matpra_u:137: prāyeṇa madhuraṃ sarvam agatyā kiṃ cid anyathā /
T17matpra_u:138: vākyaṃ tavārthasiddhyā tu sarvam eva subhāṣitam // 69
T17matpra_u:139: yac chlakṣṇaṃ yac ca paruṣaṃ yad vā tadubhayānvitam /
T17matpra_u:140: sarvam evaikarasatāṃ vimarde yāti te vacaḥ // 70
T17matpra_u:142: yair idaṃ vākyaratnānām īdṛśaṃ bhājanaṃ kṛtam // 71
T17matpra_u:144: mukhāt kṣarati te vākyaṃ candrād dravam ivāmṛtam // 72
T17matpra_u:150: gamakaṃ suprayuktatvāt trikalyāṇaṃ hi te vacaḥ // 75
T17matpra_u:151: manāṃsi tāvac chrotṝṇāṃ haranty ādau vacāṃsi te /
T17matpra_u:152: tato vimṛśyamānāni rajāṃsi ca tamāṃsi ca // 76
T17matpra_u:154: saṃvejanaṃ ca sukhināṃ yogavāhi vacas tava // 77
T17matpra_u:156: timiraghnaṃ ca mandānāṃ sārvajanyam idaṃ vacaḥ // 78
T17matpra_u:160: avandhyaṃ tena sarvatra sarvaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ tava // 80
T17matpra_u:161: yan nādeśe na cākāle naivāpātre pravartase /
T17matpra_u:162: vīryaṃ samyag ivārabdhaṃ tenāmoghaṃ vacas tava // 81
T17matpra_u:166: mataṃ yadi vigarhanti nāsti dṛṣṭisamo ripuḥ // 83
T17matpra_u:167: anvabhuṅkthā yad asyārthe jagato vyasanaṃ bahu /
T17matpra_u:168: tat saṃsmṛtya virūpe 'pi stheyaṃ te śāsane bhavet // 84
T17matpra_u:169: prāg eva hitakartuś ca hitavaktuś ca śāsanam /
T17matpra_u:170: kathaṃ na nāma kāryaṃ syād ādīptaśirasāpi te // 85
T17matpra_u:178: prayāti tatra tu svairī yatra mṛtyor agocaraḥ // 89
T17matpra_u:182: śāsanaṃ nādriyante yat kiṃ vaiśasataraṃ tataḥ // 91
T17matpra_u:185: prasūtir harṣayati te vṛddhir nandayati prajāḥ /
T17matpra_u:195: tvam oghair uhyamānānāṃ dvīpas trāṇaṃ kṣatātmanām /
T17matpra_u:209: viruddheṣv api vātsalyaṃ pravṛttiḥ patiteṣv api /
T17matpra_u:210: raudreṣv api kṛpālutvaṃ kā nāmeyaṃ tavāryatā // 105
T17matpra_u:220: tvayā hi bhagavan dharmasarvātithyam idam kṛtam // 110
T17matpra_u:222: upāsate prāñjalayaḥ śrāvakān api te surāḥ // 111
T17matpra_u:226: dvaṃdvāny ākīrṇatā ceti doṣān guṇavad udvahan // 113
T17matpra_u:229: kadannāny api bhuktāni kva cit kṣud adhivāsitā /
T17matpra_u:230: panthāno viṣamāḥ kṣuṇṇāḥ suptaṃ gokaṇṭakeṣv api // 115
T17matpra_u:233: prabhutvam api te nātha sadā nātmani vidyate /
T17matpra_u:234: vaktavya iva sarvair hi svairaṃ svārthe niyujyase // 117
T17matpra_u:235: yena kena cid eva tvaṃ yatra tatra yathā tathā /
T17matpra_u:242: tatrābhūd abhisaṃyānaṃ sadayaṃ sāmṛtaṃ ca te // 121
T17matpra_u:243: ākroṣṭāro jitāḥ kṣāntyā drugdhāḥ svastyayanena ca /
T17matpra_u:247: yat sauratyaṃ gatās tīkṣṇāḥ kadaryāś ca vadānyatām /
T17matpra_u:250: kṣamitvaṃ cāṅgulīmāle kaṃ na vismayam ānayet // 125
T17matpra_u:252: aśerata sukhaṃ dhīrās tṛptā dharmarasasya te // 126
T17matpra_u:253: pṛṣṭenāpi kva cin noktam upetyāpi kathā kṛtā /
T17matpra_u:256: tato dharmo gatamale vastre raṅga ivārpitaḥ // 128
T17matpra_u:257: na so 'sty upāyaḥ śaktir vā yena na vyāyataṃ tava /
T17matpra_u:262: sarvāṇy eva nṛdevānāṃ hitāni mahitāni ca // 131
T17matpra_u:263: na hi vaktuṃ ca kartuṃ ca bahu sādhu ca śakyate /
T17matpra_u:266: yasmān naivaṃvidhaṃ kṣetraṃ triṣu lokeṣe vidyate // 133
T17matpra_u:268: hitāya sarvasattvānāṃ yas tvam evaṃ samudyataḥ // 134
T17matpra_u:269: na tāṃ pratipadaṃ vedmi syād yayāpacitis tava /
T17matpra_u:270: api ye parinirvānti te 'pi te nānṛṇā janāḥ // 135
T17matpra_u:271: tava te 'vasthitā dharme svārtham eva tu kurvate /
T17matpra_u:272: yaḥ śramas tannimittaṃ tu tava kā tasya niṣkṛtiḥ // 136
T17matpra_u:273: tvaṃ hi jāgarṣi suptānāṃ saṃtānāny avalokayan /
T17matpra_u:278: karaṇīyaṃ bhaved yatra na dattānunayo bhavān // 139
T17matpra_u:279: yadi saṃcāriṇo dharmāḥ syur ime niyataṃ tvayā /
T17matpra_u:282: iti tvam uktavān bhūtaṃ jagat saṃjñapayann iva // 141
T17matpra_u:286: ṛṇaśeṣaṃ kim adyāpi sattveṣu yad abhūt tava // 143
T17matpra_u:289: parārthāv eva me dharmarūpakāyāv iti tvayā /
T17matpra_u:291: tathā hi satsu saṃkrāmya dharmakāyam aśeṣataḥ /
T17matpra_u:293: aho sthitir aho vṛttam aho rūpam aho guṇāḥ /
T17matpra_u:294: na nāma buddhadharmāṇām asti kiṃ cid anadbhutam // 147
T17matpra_u:296: tvayy api pratihanyante paśya mohasya raudratām // 148
T17matpra_u:298: ye tvāṃ sattvā namasyanti tebhyo 'pi sukṛtaṃ namaḥ // 149
T17matpra_u:299: akṣayās te guṇā nātha śaktis tu kṣayiṇī mama /
T17matpra_u:302: svayam evātmanātmānaṃ tvam eva jñātum arhasi // 151
T17matpra_u:304: parā ca nas tuṣṭir avasthitā hṛdi /
